reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. The first night i got a decent nights sleep, probably because i wasnt facing the busy road outside. HOWEVER, the second night was a Friday and the noise from the adjoining casino and bar round the back of the hotel was unbearable!! The bass thudded through the walls so be warned!! Superior rooms are a good size and clean. The restaurant both at night and in the morning served good meals.The hotel has two computers and a business centre which were important for internet airline check in.
reviews.title: Reasonable but avoid casino night!

reviews.text: This is the place where I was to meet the group I would be travelling around Costa Rica with (people I'd never previously met!)
reviews.title: Average hotel

reviews.text: I arrived at the hotel at 10pm, the reception was still open and the staff all spoke a good level of English and my room was nice, containing 3 single beds. The only issue for me really was there was no where to get any bottle water from in the hotel, so after 18hours travelling I had to head out into San Jose to buy water.
reviews.title: Cute, typical lodge for Costa Rica

reviews.text: The beds were comfortable, and there was a wide variety for breakfast which was all hot, with as much fruit juice/tea/coffee as you wanted.
reviews.title: Just Fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In the afternoon I sat around the pool, which wasnt very appealing, didn't look very clean and wasn't very well maintained, lights were missing leaving just holes around the pool. The hot tub was the same. I didn't use either of these facilities so cannot comment on how they were from the inside.
reviews.title: Pleasant experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed in the Villa Tournon for a total of 4 nights during the course of a VJV Costa Rica Garden of Eden holiday. On the first occasion we arrived at about 11:00 pm and were given a room facing the main road. Even though we were exhausted after a long flight from the UK we got very little sleep as the road is very busy on week days (less so on the weekend). The room was large and clean (I later found out it was a superior room). I asked if they had an alternative room the next day and they moved us without a quibble. Our next room was also a superior room on the same floor (level 3) but facing the pool - much quieter.
reviews.title: A transit hotel that should be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our last night in Costa Rica we again stayed at this hotel. This time we were on the ground floor (level 1, room 103 I think) but were not in a superior room; the difference was marked as the room was much smaller, had twin beds which were very creaky, a broken vanity unit in the bathroom and smelt vaguely damp.
reviews.title: Outstanding 4 Star Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is definitely not a chain - it has an individual feel to it which we liked, but it generally felt tired and needed redecoration in some rooms.
reviews.title: Great value and great downtown location

reviews.text: We only ate breakfast in the hotel which was OK and plentiful, but wasn't particularly inspiring. For dinners we went to El Pueblo just up the street which had a couple of restaurants to choose from (both good).
reviews.title: Functional hotel away from the city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After 15 years of traveling to San Jose, Costa Rica, I finally found a great hotel for us. Hotel Villa Tournon offers safety, comfort, good food, and excellent services in an authentic Costa Rican urban setting for individuals, families, and/or touring groups.
reviews.title: somewhat dated

reviews.text: We were booked into this hotel by EF tours so I did not choose it. I would call it adequate but I wou
reviews.title: OK for a night

reviews.text: Dn't have wanted to stay any longer. The bed was noisy due to some sort of crinkly plastic covering. The pool area looked very nice but we had no time to spend in it. Of the 5 hotels in which we stayed in Costa Rica this one rated the lowest.
reviews.title: Home away from home.

reviews.text: Location is fantastic, San Jose Center is just 5 minutes away. I have been staying at this hotel ever since I have been traveling back home on vacations. We feel like we are home away from home, the staff is very friendly, the rooms are very clean and yes maybe a little dated however, they are constantly working to maintain its individuality. Despite the fact that there are issues with the Casino we have no complains. There was an incident once when my daughters stayed there (an incident that had nothing to do with the hotel) and the staff especially the Owner-Manager were very concern and helpful. Highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Stay elsewhere...

reviews.text: Avoid this "hotel" and stay somewhere else. They are connected to a casino/dance club and if you end up in a room below the dance club don't expect to get any sleep until the wee hours of the morning. The hallways are very long & narrow and the lights are set on motion sensors. It is very creepy walking down the hallways in the dark waiting for the lights to turn on. The location isn't the best and there is really nothing in walking distance of the place. It is located on a busy street. The hotel is not very clean and it is very worn out. The restaurant was decent with food & service.
reviews.title: Noisy hotel,not worth 4*

reviews.text: The hotel is situated near one of the most noisy streets of San Jose. Trucks and buses are passing by non stop and the inhouse casino/disco makes also a lot of noise. The rooms are spacious and clean but either the window could not be closed or,after change of rooms, the safe was out of order. The carpet is worn out and the bathroom, althought clean,needs a renovation too.A flatscreen tv makes no 4* hotel. Staff is friendly and the breakfast buffet is good and plentyfull. The whole hotel has free Wi-FI access. If you want to have a quiet night try to avoid this hotel.
reviews.title: Good staff, clean rooms

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel at the beginning and end of our Costa Rica Tour. first two nights were adequate but not inspiring, the last night (Friday night) our 'Superior Room' was right on top of the night club/casino and sleep was impossible until 5am!! The superior room had carpet instead of wooden floors which was filthy and the wallpaper was peeling of the wall. A very sad ending to an otherwise really nice holiday we had in Costa Rica.
reviews.title: Very noisy and hotel is dated

reviews.text: We stayed here as part of a mission team. Many groups booked the hotel for one/two night stays - most are teenagers with limited supervision, no manners, and early departures (4am). Two different groups came thru while we were there. In one case, the 17-year-olds partying became so bad, the hotel called the police.
reviews.title: Adequate but NOISY

reviews.text: However, the staff is VERY NICE - welcoming and friendly. The rooms were fine - very clean. The beds are hard but OK. Showers have to be coincided with the availability of hot water (on a timer - ask the front desk for the schedule). Bring earplugs and leave your AC fan on to drown out the noise of the teens in the halls. Ask for a room to the left of the elevator on the third floor (ground level). Rooms to the right go toward the Casino. If you are over the casino, your room WILL smell like cigarette smoke.
reviews.title: A place for teen groups and those who don't mind staying in dorm-like atmosphere.

reviews.text: The breakfast buffet is coffee, juice, scrambled eggs, pancakes, rice and beans, toast, and sausage.
reviews.title: Very nice staff...Enjoyed my stay!

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for eight long nights. The bedding consisted of twin beds with mattresses that were as hard as rocks. The room had a strong smell of dampness that I wondered about the mold growing behind the walls. Many of those in my group complained of no hot water and window a/c units that did not work. Luckily, mine worked well.
reviews.title: Dated property - needs a refresh
